properties.body:
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
GREECE TO ITALY.
VESSEL, 18 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
BETWEEN KERKIRA (39-40N 019-45E) AND ITALY. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
